title: What makes a video game
content: @monster-manager-title.png:Beautiful greyboxing:The current home screen of the video game I'm making
Monster manager is in a weird spot.

Since autumn last year, it's been about three solid days of work from being a playable demo. Not a very good one, but one I can share with friends with no tutorialisation or indeed instructions, and let them play a glorified lemonade stand game. The trick has been actually spending that time, as it's some of the least glamourous work that needs doing.
